post.title: bnib sealed roger's iphone 3gs 16gb
post.content: got a brand new sealed in the box iphone 3gs 16gb from rogers. price: $700 location: north york local deals only low-ballers please don't waste both of our precious time, thank you =) please pm me, sms or call me at (416) 560-2159, if you need anything else please let me know. thank you for visiting.
